com.orsoncharts.interaction

Interface Chart3DMouseListener

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.util.EventListener

    public interface Chart3DMouseListener
extends java.util.EventListener
    The interface that must be implemented by classes that wish to receive Chart3DMouseEvent notifications from a Chart3DPanel.
    Since:
    1.3
    See Also:
    Chart3DPanel.addChartMouseListener(com.orsoncharts.interaction.Chart3DMouseListener)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void chartMouseClicked(Chart3DMouseEvent event)
      Callback method for receiving notification of a mouse click on a chart.
      void chartMouseMoved(Chart3DMouseEvent event)
      Callback method for receiving notification of a mouse movement on a chart.

    • Method Detail
